reviews.text: The mens’ toilet Has not been working for months (maybe years) and no one at the Station seems to care! It’s disgusting.
Station was closed monday 05 August 5.03 am   Missed my Train to luton at 5.05 might miss my plane too ! some ppl were So angry as will be late for work! Hope this two guys will have a big problem

Station is very old and building Is listed. In the heart of Peckham however needs a refurbishment and a lift. Loads of stairs however services are frequent and very well connected. Can get very overcrowded at peak times. Staff are lovely.

1st November 2018, I traveled by this station together with my little boy who have 1 year and still it’s going in the pushchair.I want to notice that I’m pregnant as well in 24 weeks and when I asked the security guy from the gates to help me because there it’s not lift,he refused with motivation that I have to hold the baby in my hands and to pickup the pushchair by myself.At that time my son was sleeping and I couldn’t wake him up,and the fact that I’m pregnant  doesn’t change nothing. I’m writing this review to see  his manager that the guy who worked in this day doesn’t do his job,seating on the chair only and he doesn’t have any respect for others,at least,when he is doing his job. Totally disappointment!!
